mapper.select: select id, wspzhm, fp_jym, jqbh, fpdm, fphm, kprq, jshj, hjse, hjje, sl, gfsh, gfmc, xfsh, xfmc, xfdz_dh, xfyhmc_yhzh, swjgdm, swjgmc, mw, zf_bz, skr, fhr, kpr, tsnsrsbh, bz, czy_id, phone_no, skm, create_time, parm1, parm2, parm3, parm4 from cd_efp_jp_invoice
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into cd_efp_jp_invoice
